name: Civil Warfare: Another Bullet In The War
description: CIVIL WARFARE allows you to fight against real players with the Battle Royale style and different game modes. You battle until you are the one last survivor of dozens of people in a Battle Royale style civil war town.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 650 1GB / AMD Radeon HD 7700 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
